concept.title: Email Campaign Tracking
concept.shortdesc: Companies can use Analytics to determine the success of an email campaign.

conbody.p: Companies often develop costly email campaigns to market their products. Companies send bulk emails to customers with the expectation that some customers will access the site and a conversion will result. Analytics can report campaign analysis data in several key metrics, including the following:

row.entry: Displays the number of click-throughs tracked from the email to the landing page.
Displays the number of purchases resulting from the email.
Displays comparison data between different types of users.

conbody.p: Modifications to the HTML email body and the JavaScript library are required to capture the key metrics shown above.
